review: The stick arrived on time and the packaging is exceptional. It really was a pleasure to open. The stick works great and is easy to use. The only problem I have with it is that it is attached to my account and I do not have Prime. My wife's account is the main account and she is a Prime member. This is a problem because even though I can get free shipping (same household) I CAN NOT access prime instant video. Customer service was exceptional and offered to switch it for me but the reason I went with Firestick was for SlingTV which is under my account.I'm only giving 4 stars for this reason. I hope in the future Amazon makes Prime instant video available to members of the same household just like shipping.
